Boris smiled circumspectly, so that it might be taken as ironical or appreciative according to the way the joke was received. Everybody laughed. 
"Your joke is too bad, it's witty but unjust," said Anna Pdvlovna, shaking her little shriveled finger at him. 
"We are not fighting pour le Roi de Prusse f but for right principles. Oh, that wicked Prince Hippolyte!" she said.
